text:
Phase I, as defined in 
83.4(r) became operative on October 20, 1998. Phase II, as defined in Section 
83.4(s) of this Chapter became operative on April 1, 2001, 24 (twenty-four) months after the FSHA adopted a resolution stating that Phase I had been implemented. This Chapter is intended to have prospective effect only, and shall not be interpreted to impair any rights under any existing City contract or property contract or permit. 
(Added by Ord. 264-98, App. 8/21/98; amended by Ord. 228-03, File No. 031402, App. 9/22/2003; Ord. 250-04, File No. 041190, App. 10/14/2004; Ord. 76-06, File No. 060166, App. 4/20/2006; Ord. 214-08, File No. 080235, App. 9/19/2008; Ord. 32-09, File No. 081512, App. 3/9/2009)
